album.name: Daisy
album.description: Steff and Simon brought Daisy down to Brighton on Saturday (Steff and I went dress shopping whilst the boys looked after Daisy).

image.caption: Daisy waves
image.description: Well, she moved her hand anyway!

image.caption: A smile?
image.description: Not sure if this constitutes a smile or not

image.caption: Looking left
image.description: I think Steff was standing to her left as I took this one
